subject: Re: The Ghost Box, is training required?
author: Jon Maronge
full_text:
ok frank.. you got me.. i wasn't taking an active role in
investigations back then, but i got to go along on a few. I really
enjoyed it back then. my fiance accuses me of being a big kid when i
go to investigate somewhere because i get so excited.

I want to be able to prove that all of this is real.

see.. we all get knocked down a couple of pegs now and again..lol..
acutally started doing my own investigations at 15 though.

jon
